# propertiesDictionary

**Instance Property**

A dictionary of properties for a provider.

## Declaration

```swift
var propertiesDictionary: [CMIOExtensionProperty : CMIOExtensionPropertyState<AnyObject>] { get set }
```

## Managing Properties

- **name**: The provider name.
- **manufacturer**: The provider manufacturer.
- **setPropertyState(_:forProperty:)**: Sets a state value for the specified property.

items.description: Sets a state value for the specified property.
items.name: setPropertyState(_:forProperty:)
